title: 3 friends LF Jungle & ADC for clash team.
body:
Greetings Summoners of OCE. 

With the new team-based competitive mode, Clash, coming in 2018, 3 friends and their clan, Boosted Animals, are looking to recruit friendly and mature players to join us on the Rift. We would love to fill the team ASAP so we can start to practice and build synergy as a cohesive unit. We have a mid laner (Frogglun), a preferred support (Burnout) and myself as preferred top, so it would be awesome if these players were jungle and ADC mains but beggars can't be choosers - ultimately personality and a strong team commitment will suffice. If this is you, please contact me on here or add Burnout, Frogglun and/or freshmattie in game.

Edit: ADC role filled, desperately seeking a Jungler!

replies.body: I can play jg if you guys will have me. My rank is p3 if that's ok

If that's ok :'). Dude, we're scrubs. Our best player is our ADC (also from the notice boards). You'll be carrying complete scrubs. Add freshmattie and Frogglun and we'll chat

I already added you
Drop your support and have me instead. Burnout sounds like a right jerk
